summary: This is an email exchange from June 2020 regarding an investigation by the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force. The email discusses a request to search records for any financial connections between Ghislaine Maxwell, Borgerson, or Jeffrey Epstein to Sutton, NH, as a target's cell phone has been active in that area for the past 30 days.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell

events.title: Investigation into Sutton, NH connections
events.description: The NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force is investigating a target whose cell phone has been active in the Sutton, NH area for the past 30 days, prompting a search for financial connections to Maxwell, Borgerson, or Epstein.

keyFacts: The NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force was actively investigating a target in June 2020 whose cell phone was hitting in the Sutton, NH area for at least 30 days.
Investigators sought to search records for any financial connections between Ghislaine Maxwell, Borgerson, or Jeffrey Epstein and Sutton, NH to help narrow their search for a possible address.
The email indicates ongoing investigative efforts to locate individuals or properties linked to Epstein and Maxwell associates in New Hampshire.
